item.title: Lotka-Volterra
item.description: Some words about mechanistic modeling Differential equations Dynamical systems Fixed points The model Exploration of the Lotka-Volterra parameters Descriptive analysis Vector plots Explanation of fluid flow and fixed points Perturbation analysis Perturbation about the two fixed points Linearization Jacobian calculation Decoupling and analytic solutions RK4 numerical solution Pick a set of parameters Pick initial value closed to fixed points Solve the two scenario Illustration from Victor Hugo et son temps (1881) Link to GitHub Repository
